text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Applying the most appropriate training load , and managing her emotionally by chatting during breaks…

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Splendid… Absolutely splendid! You must be the most extraordinary trainer in history! I'm so glad to be a reporter of this era…!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Ahh, I can't stay like this. I have to go back to the office and write an article as soon as possible…!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: "An outstanding trainer who loves Uma Musume and is determined to devote their life to them is at Tracen Academy." …!
